title: I'm at 985 wins!!
body: Im about to hit 1000 wins in normals and i had a friend, who told me that if i told riot that they would get a staff member to play with me on my 999th game to play with me in my 1000th win i was just wandering if this was true or if he was just pulling my leg.

replies.body: We still play, it's just a matter of if we see your post on the boards!
so at 999 wins i'll stop playing normals till i get incontact with a employe thanks!!
I can play in ~2 hours if you're around. :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FMaMoLRU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-19T18:58:50.388+0000)
>
> We still play, it's just a matter of if we see your post on the boards!

is there a good way to get seen, its been 2 years and im about to hit 2000 wins was wanting to know if you wanted to play again?
The best way for me is honestly via Twitter, or @ing me on the boards. *I don't check boards on the weekends.*

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FMaMoLRU,comment-id=000300020000,timestamp=2017-07-06T17:02:07.089+0000)
>
> The best way for me is honestly via Twitter, or @ing me on the boards. *I don't check boards on the weekends.*

Ok, thanks. I made a twitter and i guess i'll tweet at you or whatever its called from @maddogmedinajoe, when im at 1999. Thanks so much!

Sweet deal! I followed you, so feel free to just DM me when you're ready! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Just what exactly is so exciting about playing with Rioters? You CAN'T cuss at people or call them a noob and you CAN'T go Away From Keyboard if you don't feel like playing anymore. If you do they might punish you ON THE SPOT. Riot employees are like you and me, but works for Riot and probably only makes on average 20-25 bucks and hour....Its not like you're playing this game with your favourite celebrity or Kim Jong Un, nothing exciting, or "WOW" about it.

The only time I would ask to play with them is if I'm banned or chat restricted, then be super nice in game with them. After that I convince them that I am a nice guy and get punishments removed. OR if I'm planning to work for Riot so I play a game with them just so that I can keep in touch and ask questions easier.  LOL :D

> [{quoted}](name=ThorSlayer,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FMaMoLRU,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-20T00:16:17.969+0000)

You're rather very rude and often have a negative behavior towards others, don't you......
Talk about a Buzz kill.  Leave ThorSlayer out.  I'll take someone else for my 1000th :)

ummmm LOL
I haven't heard of it, but what if you lost that game? Would the employee have to play with you until you win one?

> [{quoted}](name=Elfan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FMaMoLRU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-19T06:29:28.275+0000)
>
> I haven't heard of it, but what if you lost that game? Would the employee have to play with you until you win one?

I've played 2-3 games with a couple people before because we lost the first game. ^-^
Wait, people can actually do this?
they still do it, i know a few people who've had rioters play with them.
I really doubt that's true but you can try I guess.
